description: Detects adding and using Exchange PowerShell snap-ins to export mailbox data. As seen used by HAFNIUM and APT27
author: FPT.EagleEye
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Exchange PowerShell Snap-Ins Usage
query: ((((process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND process.command_line.text:"*Add\-PSSnapin*" AND process.command_line.text:("*Microsoft.Exchange.Powershell.Snapin*" OR "*Microsoft.Exchange.Management.PowerShell.SnapIn*")) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\msiexec.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*$exserver\=Get\-ExchangeServer\ \(\[Environment\]\:\:MachineName\)\ \-ErrorVariable\ exerr\ 2>\ $null*")))
